nav.div: Binghamton City School District » For Parents » Community Safety Alerts » COVID- 19 Updates

p.span: This page will keep parents faculty and staff alerted about updates related to COVID-19 in our community. New Yorkers can call the state hotline at 1-888-364-3065, where experts from the Department of Health can answer questions regarding the novel Coronavirus.

a.title: Technology Support for Parents and Students

p.span: Working papers – Please contact Debbie Card, Director of Pupil Services at 607-422-1734 for established set day and time.

br.br: Registration Office Hours will be on Mondays from 10 a.m. to 12:30 p.m.

div.p: Mental Health Crisis Mobile Team can be reached at the following number:

Warm Line Peer Support: (607)240-7291
NYS Mental Health support hotline: 1-844-863-9314
get free emotional support, consultations and referrals to a provider.
